titles.title: A bill to require executive agencies to make advance payments under contracts with minority and small business concerns under certain circumstances.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

bill.summary: 3/26/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to require executive agencies to make advance payments under contracts for the procurement of property or services from a small or minority business concern if: (1) such concern provides adequate security; (2) the payments will not exceed the unpaid contract price; and (3) the payments are in the public interest or facilitate the national defense.
